akn:section.akn:heading: Disclaimer by appointee, object, or taker in default of exercise of power of appointment.

akn:content.akn:p: A disclaimer of an interest in property by an appointee of a power of appointment takes effect as of the time the instrument by which the holder exercises the power becomes irrevocable.
A disclaimer of an interest in property by an object or taker in default of an exercise of a power of appointment takes effect as of the time the instrument creating the power becomes irrevocable.
